text: It ’ s time to retire the pineapple. USA Network is officially ending its long - running scripted comedy series Psych after the current eighth season, The Hollywood Reporter has learned. The series finale has been set for March 26 at 9 p. m. A special one - hour live show, Psych After Show, will follow at 10 p. m., featuring a Q & A discussion with series creator Steve Franks and the entire cast taped in front of a studio audience in Los Angeles. James Roday and Dule Hill also released a video announcing the final episodes.
